Summary: It was about the size of a pea at arms length.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shelbyville
There were no other sightings in Shelbyville on or around July 6th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsat 2245, 7-6-2009. I was working as a security supervisor at a major sports uniform manufacturer and I was on interior patrol and part of my patrols is open several exit doors, when I opened one of the doors I saw a star like object that looked like the North Star but it was larger. not thinking anything of it, I blew it off. I looked at the "star" again and noticed it was moving from WSW towards the ENE. At arms length, the objects size was about the size of a pea and it was about 2000 feet up, I first thought it was a plane approaching The Indianapolis International Airport, but, the was no flashing lights or sound. it was just a light & I watched it for about 2.5 minutes before it disappeared behind another building.
